SEARCH
Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.config.logger

Class LoggerConfig

java.lang.Object
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.config.logger.LoggerConfig
@ConfigFile("{logger_dir}/logger.{ext}") @ConfigReloadable(sections={"chat","console","sub-loggers"}) @Comment("MagicUtils Logger Configuration") public class LoggerConfig extends Object
Configuration for the MagicUtils Logger system. This class manages all logging-related settings including plugin identification, debug options, message formatting for both chat and console, and sub-logger configurations. Constructor initializes default values for all logging components.

    • isSubLoggerEnabled

      public boolean isSubLoggerEnabled(String name)
      Checks if a sub-logger is enabled.
      Parameters:
      name - the sub-logger name
      Returns:
      true if the sub-logger is enabled or not configured (defaults to enabled)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the sub-logger was added, false otherwise
